Uses of Package
org.robolectric.shadows

  • Packages that use org.robolectric.shadows 
    Package Description
    org.robolectric
    Package containing main Robolectric classes.
    org.robolectric.shadows
    Package containing shadow classes for the Android SDK.
    org.robolectric.shadows.maps
    Shadows for Google Maps.
    org.robolectric.shadows.support.v4
    Shadows for the Android Support Library.
    org.robolectric.shadows.util
    Package containing shadow related utility classes.

    ShadowHandler
    Deprecated. 
    There is no special shadow implementation for the Handler class. The special handling is all done by ShadowLooper and ShadowMessageQueue. This class has been retained for backward compatibility with the various static method implementations.
